1:
--------------------
Text: Borough of Berwick-upon-Tweed:  The district had a resident population of 25,949 according to the 2001 census, which also notes that it is the most ethnically homogeneous in the country, with 99.6% of the population recording themselves in the 2001 census as "White".
Triplets:<Borough of Berwick-upon-Tweed
2:
--------------------
Text: Borough of Berwick-upon-Tweed:  It was also the smallest district in England with borough status, and the third-least densely populated local government district (after Eden and Tynedale).
Triplets:<Borough of Berwick-upon-Tweed
